reviewtext: i'd just like to say, thank you Targus!!  not only portable, i can enter detailed info into my PDA instead of writing in shorthand/graffiti.  graffiti is great for memos.. stowaway keyboard great for notes, word processing, email, spreadsheets.whenever i get to work, i just set this baby up and i'm ready to jot down anything i need to.  the PDA sort of becomes a laptop only you don't have to wait to long for the laptop to power up.another great plus about the keyboard is that there are keys that directly call up the datebook, calculator, todo list, etc..buy it!!!
